item.description:
High energy maritime and Celtic folk rock locals Justin & John from "Ice Cream Social" will be performing for three hours at Bull McCabe's Pub in Union Sq., Somerville, MA. The boys of Ice Cream Social will be singing sea chanties, traditional Irish folk tunes and their own original maritime and folk rock songs. The event is 21+, no cover (though there is a $5 suggested donation that goes to the band).

9:00 - 10:00 Sally O'Briens' hosted by Christine, Social Fun Group (No cover!!!)

Come join me to see an AMAZING Swing, funk and rockabilly band The Knuckledusters for some great music, food & fun!!

Then, Go across the street

10:00PM - 1:00 PM Bull McCabe's hosted by Lauren and Christine (No Cover!!)
See the Celtic Rock Comedy Duo "Ice Cream Social" Band visit: www.facebook.com/ICSMusic or www.myspace.com/IceCreamSocialDuo

DIRECTIONS here
STREET PARKING ONLY.....DO NOT PARK IN THE PARKING LOT NEXT TO BULL McCABE'S!
item.how_to_find_us: Cell phone numbers will be send by email to "yes" and "Maybe" rsvps
item.name: Bull McCabe's/Sally O'Brien Mini Pub Crawl in Union Square (Somerville)
